channel.title: Run.bat Error
channel.description:
Hi everyone i have a 64-bit, Windows 7 computer. My friend and I and in progress of making a server but i cannot get my client to run. My friend has a 64-bit, Windows 7 as well and it works fine for him.
Heres what is in the run.bat: @echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
And heres the error i get: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/33llbwp.png[/img]

item.title: Run.bat Error
item.dc:creator: @Brandon_o_0 Brandon o_0
item.description:
@Brandon_o_0 wrote:

Actually x86 is 64-bit =D. I know cause i see it right now… But thx anyway…

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat Error
item.dc:creator: @str0ngscap3 str0ngscap3
item.description:
@str0ngscap3 wrote:

this code is for 32 bit pc cuz

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

x86 is 32 bit

i think you must change the x86 in too x64

hope that it helped

Read full topic

@Brandon_o_0 wrote:

Hi everyone i have a 64-bit, Windows 7 computer. My friend and I and in progress of making a server but i cannot get my client to run. My friend has a 64-bit, Windows 7 as well and it works fine for him.

Heres what is in the run.bat:

Title Client
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit
